sentences.en: ‘I don’t think it’s right,’ John persisted.
sentences.cn: “我认为那不对。”约翰坚持说道。

sentences.en: Britons persist in treating any pay rise of less than 5% as a slap in the face.
sentences.cn: 英国人坚持认为加薪不到5%不啻于一种羞辱。

sentences.en: Contact your doctor if the cough persists.
sentences.cn: 如果持续咳嗽，就与医生联系。

sentences.en: Despite official denials, the rumours still persist.
sentences.cn: 尽管官方予以否认，但谣言仍未平息。

sentences.en: Existential questions requir-ing religious answers still persist.
sentences.cn: 需要通过宗教来解释的关乎人类存在的问题仍然存留。

sentences.en: Existential questions requiring religious answers still persist.
sentences.cn: 需要通过宗教来解释的关乎人类存在的问题仍然存留。

sentences.en: His strength of will enabled him to persist.
sentences.cn: 他的意志力使他能坚持下去.

sentences.en: If the pain persists, you must see a doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果一直痛，你就必须去看医生了。

sentences.en: If the symptoms persist, it is important to go to your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果这些症状持续存在，一定要去看医生。

sentences.en: Most of them persist in setting strict demands on themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们大多数人坚持严格要求自己.

sentences.en: Nothing's impossible and it all depends on man ; you would win through if you persist.
sentences.cn: 事在人为, 努力干下去,总会赢得胜利的.

sentences.en: Persist in progress and oppose retrogression!
The bad weather will persist all over the country.
sentences.cn: 这种坏天气将在全国各地持续下去.

sentences.en: The virus may persist in the inoculation site for several days.
sentences.cn: 这种病毒可留在接种部位达数天.

sentences.en: Under new situations and circumstances, some people persist in handling matter according to past experience and old habits.
sentences.cn: 在新形势下, 有些人仍然在穿新鞋,走老路.

sentences.en: We must persist in taking the road of self reliance.
sentences.cn: 我们必须坚持自力更生的道路.

sentences.en: When I set my mind to something, I persist.
sentences.cn: 一旦我对某事拿定主意，我就会坚持到底。

sentences.en: Why do you persist in blaming yourself for what happened?
sentences.cn: 你何必为已发生的事没完没了地自责？

words.tran_cn: 固执的，坚持的；持久稳固的
持续言语（指言语反复不止的病态）；持续重复的行为；执拗
患持续言语症；表现固执

trans.tran_cn: 坚持，固执，存留，继续存在
trans.tran_en: to continue to do something, although this is difficult, or other people oppose it
